name: RUNO: Crazy Eights card game
description:
Runo is a must-have for everyone who loves 'Crazy Eights' or Uno game. The game rules are simple and very easy to learn.
Features
- Customize your game by choosing the number of opponents
- Choose card theme: viking runes or digits
- Play online with family and friends
- Play anywhere with smartphone, Mac or PC
- Player rankings
- Unlimited undo
- Clear design without bells and whistles
- Browser game at https://runo-game.appspot.com

Game rules:
The player has to match the card in the discard pile either by value or color. For example, if the card is a blue 8, player must throw down a blue card or any color 8. Or the player can throw down a Wild color card. If the player doesn't have anything to match, he must pick a card from the stock pile. If he can play what is drawn, great. Otherwise, play moves to the next person.

The first player to get rid of his/her last card ("going out") wins the hand and scores points for the cards held by the other players. Number cards count their face value, all action cards count twenty, and Wild and Wild Draw Four cards count fifty.
